speaker: President. −
english: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0392/2007 ) by Carlos José Iturgaiz Angulo, on behalf of the Committee on Petitions, on the deliberations of the Committee on Petitions during the year 2006 ( 2007/2132(INI) ).

agenda_item: Report on the deliberations of the Committee on Petitions during the year 2006 (debate)
